extendedInfo.description: On Sale Now!The best-selling Princeton field guide to the land and marine mammals of the United States and Canada is now available in digital form on the Android Market.NB: Please note that an additional download of 65MB is required once this app has been installed. Please ensure you use a WiFi connection to prevent additional data costs.All the beautiful and accurate illustrations as well as the easy-to-use functionality of the book have been kept while also adding extra features such as:â The ability to expand and zoom into the high-resolution images.â Photographs that complement the illustrations of certain species.â Calls for over 150 species (including multiple calls for some species).â Quick swiping through the 462 mammals.â The ability to easily find a species using either common or scientific names and in taxonomic or alphabetic order.â The ability to only show species for a specified postal code.â A compare feature that lets you view two species at the same time on the same screen.â Interactive tracks that quickly link to the associated mammal.â A personal record of mammal sightings that can be exported using email.We invite all users to share their comments and ideas on our forum at www.mydigitalearth.com

reviews.title: Needs updating
reviews.comment: This is a good app, but it needs updating. It is based on the first edition of the print book, but there is (and has been for months) a second edition of the book that corrects several mistakes in the first edition (and that are thus also found in this app). An update would raise my rating to 4 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App will not run at all
reviews.comment: Installed fine on Galaxy Proclaim phone (Android 2.3.5), but app will only get to the opening screen before crashing for unexpected reasons.  I emailed the support address for either a workaround to get it running, or a refund, but I haven\'t heard anything at all.  I just want my money back at this point
reviews.author: Paula P

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Same Illustrations on info from the book. Better than the other mammal field guide app. Scat illustrations are not grouped based on diet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not worth the money
reviews.comment: There is really not much to this app. There is no introductory background information and the descriptions of the species are very brief. Graphics and photos are ok but not great. The app displays in landscape mode on my tablet but it is clearly not designed for that orientation. I really expected more for the steep price. After using this app I appreciate the Audobon mammals app much more.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: After fixing the loding error I\'m thrilled. I have the audubon app for my itouch but this is so much better. So happy :-)
reviews.author: A Google User
